attributes.action: Reverse the decision which made leaving the EU with no deal no longer possible
attributes.additional_details: Any MP sent to prison should no longer have the right to be an MP and vote in the House and this proposal was fast tracked through the system which was also unfair.
attributes.background: The vote to withdraw no deal for Brexit was won by 1 vote. 1 MP was recently in prison and eligible to vote. This should not have been allowed.
